title: Teenagers arrested over Aberdare explosion and fire
article: Two teenagers have been arrested in connection with an explosion and fire at a business in Rhondda Cynon Taf. The boys, aged 13 and 14, from Aberaman and Hirwaun, are being questioned by police investigating theblast near Aberdare on Tuesday . South Wales Fire and Rescue Service attended the scene at Farrells Furniture on Cardiff Road, Aberaman, at about 19:00 GMT. The cause of the explosion is being investigated.
